long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Managed Data Cleanup (CMDC) is a Chrome extension which aids admins in bulk user Chrome data cleanup. How often have you told users to "delete your cache and cookies" in order to resolve a browser issue? CMDC automates the cleanup process for your users. Admins can automatically empty users cache, history and cookie data. To use CMDC, an administrator must force install the extension for users and configure the app policy. See details at https://github.com/jay0lee/cmdc.
